title: FullMoonRunning
description: A movement that every Full Moon will connect runners around the world.
yours: There isn't other like it in the world and it's yours forever.

agree.text: By clicking, I confirm that I've read and understood the current {privacy} and that I agree

success.title: Contratulations, you are a FullMoonRunner!
success.text: Before the next full moon, you will receive your FullMoonRunner Bib Number in your inbox.

errors.agree: You have to agree the Terms of Service
errors.errorGoogle: There have been an error with Google. Please, try with other method.
errors.errorFacebook: There have been an error with Facebook. Please, try with other method.

promo: Coming Soon: the official app and merchandising of the FullMoonRunning movement.
